menu.description: If you are one of those people who like your chicken big on spiciness, this is the sandwich for you. A thick, juicy cutlet of chicken thigh and drum sits fiery hot on a bed of crunchy letture between toasted sesame seed buns - shiok!
Feel the heat. We double the spiciness with two fiery, juicy whole-muscle chicken on a bed of crisp lettuce between toasted sesame seed buns - shiok!
